  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.controller used by it.polimi.ingsw.controller
    Class
    Description
    GameActionHandler
    This class represents the collection of methods and game finite state machine that allow the actual controller in MVC pattern to execute methods and requests by the player and verify that these requests are actually correct.
